With a middle-class socioeconomic status, their activities reflect a comfortable lifestyle that incorporates both leisure and exploration of diverse culinary and artistic offerings. Moving forward, potential future visits could include more bookstores, art galleries, and perhaps local community events centered around cultural festivals.
